name: JANAKALYAN
briefDescription: JANAKALYAN HAS DONE ENVIRONMENT CONSERVATION WORKSHOPS,RALLIES,AWARENESS CAMPS AND PLANTATIONS. IT HAS ALSO DONE SEED TREATMENT CAMPAIGN, LINE TRANSPLANTING OF PADDY, SERVED 1400 PEOPLE. IT HAS DONE SC/ST PEOPLE AWARENESS ON PCR & POA ACT. IT HAS DONE A 3 MONTHS RESIDENTIAL CAMPS FOR ADOLESCENTS, SERVED 100 PEOPLE. HAS DONE HEALTH CAMP, SERVED MORE THAN 400 PEOPLE. IT HAS DONE AWARENESS GENERATION PROGRAMME FOR WOMEN WHERE IT SERVED 25 WOMEN.
